name: Battle Arena Toshinden Remix
summary: Be prepared to meet your maker! Anything goes in this 360-degree tournament fighter - upgraded for Sega Saturn. You've got to pulverize all 9 opponents - including the never-before-seen Kupeed - with a vast array of special combo moves and expert weapons skills! Losing means paying the ultimate price - your life! Includes a never-before-seen new character and tons of deadly new moves! If you are successful, even greater challenges await you as hidden challengers emerge to take you on!
